The Band Concert is a 1935 American animated short film produced in 3-strip 
Technicolor by Walt Disney Productions and released by United Artists. The film 
was the first Mickey Mouse film produced in color and remains one of the most 
highly acclaimed of the Disney shorts. ... The Band Concert was directed by
